long_description: Slide Strap Brackets reposition your Hotronic Footwarmer Powerpack along the side of your boots for greater convenience and security. Bracket replaces Footwarmer's wire clip system; mounting on side of boots keeps powerpacks above and out of the way of top buckles. Side mounting also keeps powerpacks out of harm's way from chairlifts, stair treads and curbs. Powerpack simply slides down bracket and snaps into place; includes heating element plug holder for use when powerpack is not attached.
short_description: Slide Strap Brackets reposition your Hotronic Footwarmer Powerpack along the side of your boots for greater convenience and security.
